title: TDC Non-Latin Week-Ends continue with Greek
content:
Join Gerry Leonidas for a weekend of Greek type design.

Friday Oct 5 through Sunday Oct 7.

[http://tdc.org/events/education/non-latinweek-ends/2007nonlatleonidasgre...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202193146/http:/tdc.org/events/education/non-latinweek-ends/2007nonlatleonidasgreek.html "http://tdc.org/events/education/non-latinweek-ends/2007nonlatleonidasgreek.html")

 [‹ Avenir vs. Avenir Next](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202193146/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36755 "Go to previous forum topic") [Blanka & Candy, in association with Veer, present '50' in NYC. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202193146/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36904 "Go to next forum topic")
author: terminaldesign

comments.content:
I’ll be there! Hope to see you, James.

ChrisL
I’ll be there. The Cyrillic was such a blast I had to sign up for the Greek!

Is ther going to be a format sent out ahead of time like before or is Gerry doing it a new way?

ChrisL
